title: Gamification-Based Design Thinking Innovation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts Understanding, Creative Problem-Solving Experience
context.additional_context: Internalizing the design thinking process through team-based game mode creation activities using digital platforms

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five stages of design thinking (empathize-research for understanding, define, ideate, prototype, test) through three or more game mode design projects.
Learners can demonstrate the process of creatively solving complex mathematical problems using team-developed game mode deliverables.
Learners demonstrate improved collaboration and communication skills in the design thinking process through formative assessments (feedback sessions, peer evaluations, self-reflection journals).

resources: Game Mode Authoring Software (e.g., Unity, Unreal Engine Educational Editions)
Pre-Built Game Templates (2D/3D Math Problem-Solving Types)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
